Package it.polimi.ingsw.game_view.board

Class IslandBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.game_view.board.IslandBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class IslandBoard extends Object implements Serializable
Class to represent islands in a light way, to transmit as fewer data as possible
See Also:

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    IslandBoard(Island island, boolean hasMotherNature, int islandIndex)
    Constructor method, create the island ring, current students on each island, current tower number, island index, current color of towers built on the island(there can be only towers with the same color), deniedCounter(a property of an island given by an advanced card), the presence of mother nature and island ID.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    getDeniedCounter()
    get the presence of a "No Entry Tile" on an island, that is a tile which prevents influence calculation for one turn, it expires when Mother Nature step on a island once after a "No Entry Tile" is placed on the island.

      public static final long serialVersionUID
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • IslandBoard

      public IslandBoard(Island island, boolean hasMotherNature, int islandIndex)
      Constructor method, create the island ring, current students on each island, current tower number, island index, current color of towers built on the island(there can be only towers with the same color), deniedCounter(a property of an island given by an advanced card), the presence of mother nature and island ID.
      Parameters:
      island - current island
      hasMotherNature - flag to report if mother nature is on the island or not
      islandIndex - index of island
      See Also:
      • Island
      • MotherNature
      • Game

  • Method Details

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object

    • getStudents

      public List<ColorCharacter> getStudents()
      Get the students placed on the island
      Returns:
      list of students on the island

    • getID

      public int getID()
      gets island ID
      Returns:
      ID of island

    • getTowerNumber

      public int getTowerNumber()
      get number of towers present on the island
      Returns:
      number of same color towers present on the island

    • getTowerColor

      public ColorTower getTowerColor()
      Get current tower's color set on the island
      Returns:
      color of tower set on the island

    • getDeniedCounter

      public int getDeniedCounter()
      get the presence of a "No Entry Tile" on an island, that is a tile which prevents influence calculation for one turn, it expires when Mother Nature step on a island once after a "No Entry Tile" is placed on the island.
      Returns:
      deniedCounter, that is the flag that notify If the "No entry Tile" has already expired.

    • hasMotherNature

      public boolean hasMotherNature()
      Get the information of the presence of mother nature on a island.
      Returns:
      hasMotherNature flag which is true if Mother Nature is on the island, false otherwise.
